description:
average value of the instantaneous failure intensity over a given time interval (t1, t2).
Note 1 The mean failure intensity is related to instantaneous failure intensity z(t) as follows:

z¯(t1, t2)=1t2−t1∫  t2  t1z(t) dt

Note 2 Terms 'mean' or 'average' are used as synonyms  to the term arithmetic mean.
